alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 28 at 2:47PM MST until November 28 at 10:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Gila Highlands/Black Range and Eastern Black Range Foothills Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 10 PM MST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds are expected to last for the duration of the warned time frame, with the strongest winds from midnight Tuesday through 2 PM MST Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
